price: 57. ¡Gentes!, os ha llegado una exhortación de vuestro Señor, una cura para los corazones, una guía y misericordia para los creyentes (el Corán).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكُم مَّوۡعِظَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَشِفَآءٞ لِّمَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu qad jāatkum mawʿiẓatun min rabbikum washifāon limā fī al-ṣudūri wahudan waraḥmatun lil'mu'minīna
